00040 #include "trajectory_generator/OmniDriveTrajectoryGenerator.h"
00041 #include "navigation_trajectory_common/Conversions.h"
00042 
00043 #include "omnidrive_controller/OmniDrivePositionController.h"
00044 #include "navigation_trajectory_follower/TrajectoryFollowerNode.h"
00045 #include "tf/transform_datatypes.h"
00046 #include "nav_msgs/Odometry.h"
00047 #include "nav_msgs/Path.h"
00048 #include "geometry_msgs/Twist.h"
00049 #include <navigation_trajectory_follower/ConversionUtils.h>
00050 
00051 using namespace std;
00052 
00053 ros::Publisher twistPublisher;
00054 Odometry actualOdometry;
00055 PositionController* controller;
00056 ros::Time startTime;
00057 
00058 ros::Publisher debugPath;
00059 
00060 void poseRosToPose2d(const geometry_msgs::Pose& pose, Pose2D& pose2d) {
00061 
00062     double x = pose.position.x;
00063     double y = pose.position.y;
00064     double theta = tf::getYaw(pose.orientation);
00065 
00066     pose2d = Pose2D(x, y, theta);
00067 }
00068 
00069 void twistRosToTwist2d(const geometry_msgs::Twist& twist, Twist2D& twist2d) {
00070 
00071     double x = twist.linear.x;
00072     double y = twist.linear.y;
00073     double theta = twist.angular.z;
00074 
00075     twist2d = Twist2D(x, y, theta);
00076 
00077 }
00078 
00079 void pose2dToPoseRos(const Pose2D& pose2d, geometry_msgs::Pose& pose) {
00080 
00081     pose.position.x = pose2d.getX();
00082     pose.position.y = pose2d.getY();
00083     tf::Quaternion quat;
00084 
00085     quat.setRPY(0, 0, pose2d.getTheta());
00086     tf::quaternionTFToMsg(quat, pose.orientation);
00087 
00088 }
00089 
00090 void trajectoryRosToOdomVector(const navigation_trajectory_msgs::Trajectory& trajectoryROS, std::vector<Odometry>& odometryVector) {
00091 
00092     nav_msgs::Odometry odom;
00093     navigation_trajectory_msgs::Trajectory::_trajectory_type::const_iterator it;
00094 
00095     for (it = trajectoryROS.trajectory.begin(); it != trajectoryROS.trajectory.end(); ++it) {
00096 
00097         odom = *it;
00098         Pose2D pose2d;
00099         poseRosToPose2d(odom.pose.pose, pose2d);
00100         Twist2D twist2d;
00101         twistRosToTwist2d(odom.twist.twist, twist2d);
00102         odometryVector.push_back(Odometry(pose2d, twist2d));
00103 
00104     }
00105 
00106 }
00107 
00108 void twist2dToTwistRos(const Twist2D& twist2d, geometry_msgs::Twist& twist) {
00109 
00110     twist.linear.x = twist2d.getX();
00111     twist.linear.y = twist2d.getY();
00112     twist.angular.z = twist2d.getTheta();
00113 
00114 }
00115 
00116 void odomCallback(const nav_msgs::Odometry& odometry) {
00117 
00118     const geometry_msgs::Pose pose = odometry.pose.pose;
00119     const geometry_msgs::Twist twist = odometry.twist.twist;
00120 
00121     Pose2D pose2d;
00122     Twist2D twist2d;
00123 
00124     poseRosToPose2d(pose, pose2d);
00125     twistRosToTwist2d(twist, twist2d);
00126 
00127     actualOdometry = Odometry(pose2d, twist2d);
00128 
00129 }
00130 
00131 void pathCallback(const nav_msgs::Path& path) {
00132     OmniDriveTrajectoryGenerator trajectoryGenerator;
00133     std::vector<FrameWithId> pathKDL;
00134     conversions::pathRosToPath(path, pathKDL);
00135     std::vector<FrameWithId> trajectoryKDL;
00136     trajectoryGenerator.computeTrajectroy(pathKDL, trajectoryKDL);
00137 }
00138 
00139 void trajectoryCallback(const navigation_trajectory_msgs::Trajectory& trajectory) {
00140 
00141     std::vector <Odometry> odometry;
00142     trajectoryRosToOdomVector(trajectory, odometry);
00143 
00144     startTime = ros::Time::now();
00145     controller->setTargetTrajectory(odometry);
00146 
00147     nav_msgs::Path path;
00148 
00149     for (int i = 0; i < trajectory.trajectory.size(); i++) {
00150 
00151         geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pose;
00152         pose.pose = trajectory.trajectory[i].pose.pose;
00153         pose.header = trajectory.trajectory[i].header;
00154         pose.header.frame_id = "odom";
00155         path.poses.push_back(pose);
00156 
00157     }
00158 
00159     path.header = trajectory.header;
00160     path.header.frame_id = "odom";
00161 
00162     ROS_INFO("published %lu poses", path.poses.size());
00163     debugPath.publish(path);
00164 
00165 }
00166 
00167 void publishOdometry(const Odometry& odometry) {
00168 
00169     geometry_msgs::Twist twist;
00170     geometry_msgs::Pose pose;
00171     pose2dToPoseRos(odometry.getPose2D(), pose);
00172     twist2dToTwistRos(odometry.getTwist2D(), twist);
00173 
00174     nav_msgs::Odometry odomRos;
00175     odomRos.pose.pose = pose;
00176     odomRos.twist.twist = twist;
00177     odomRos.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
00178 
00179     twistPublisher.publish(twist);
00180 
00181 }
00182 
00183 void controlLoop() {
00184 
00185     double elapsedTime = ros::Duration(ros::Time::now() - startTime).toSec();
00186     Odometry newOdometry = controller->computeNewOdometry(actualOdometry, elapsedTime);
00187     publishOdometry(newOdometry);
00188 
00189 }
00190 
00191 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00192 
00193     std::string name = "trajectory_follower";
00194     ros::init(argc, argv, name);
00195 
00196     ros::NodeHandle node = ros::NodeHandle("~/");
00197     ros::NodeHandle globalNode = ros::NodeHandle();
00198 
00199     double cycleFrequencyInHz;
00200 
00201     double velocityGainTranslation;
00202     double positionGainTranslation;
00203     double velocityToleranceTranslation;
00204     double positionToleranceTranslation;
00205 
00206     double velocityGainRotation;
00207     double positionGainRotation;
00208     double velocityToleranceRotation;
00209     double positionToleranceRotation;
00210 
00211     string inputTrajectoryTopic;
00212     string inputOdometryTopic;
00213     string inputVelocityTopic;
00214 
00215     node.param("cycleFrequencyInHz", cycleFrequencyInHz, 50.0);
00216 
00217     node.param("velocityGainTranslation", velocityGainTranslation, 1.33);
00218     node.param("positionGainTranslation", positionGainTranslation, 0.2);
00219     node.param("positionToleranceTranslation", positionToleranceTranslation, 0.1);
00220     node.param("velocityToleranceTranslation", velocityToleranceTranslation, 0.01);
00221 
00222     node.param("velocityGainRotation", velocityGainRotation, 1.35);
00223     node.param("positionGainRotation", positionGainRotation, 0.2);
00224     node.param("positionToleranceRotation", positionToleranceTranslation, 0.1);
00225     node.param("velocityToleranceRotation", velocityToleranceTranslation, 0.01);
00226 
00227     node.param<string > ("inputTrajectoryTopic", inputTrajectoryTopic, "localTrajectory");
00228     node.param<string > ("inputOdometryTopic", inputOdometryTopic, "odom");
00229     node.param<string > ("outputVelocityTopic", inputVelocityTopic, "cmd_vel");
00230 
00231     ros::Subscriber trajectorySubscriber;
00232     ros::Subscriber odomSubscriber;
00233     twistPublisher = globalNode.advertise<geometry_msgs::Twist > (inputVelocityTopic, 1);
00234     odomSubscriber = globalNode.subscribe(inputOdometryTopic, 1, &odomCallback);
00235     trajectorySubscriber = globalNode.subscribe(inputTrajectoryTopic, 1, &trajectoryCallback);
00236 
00237     controller = new OmniDrivePositionController(positionGainTranslation,
00238             velocityGainTranslation,
00239             positionGainRotation,
00240             velocityGainRotation,
00241             positionToleranceTranslation,
00242             velocityToleranceTranslation,
00243             positionToleranceRotation,
00244             velocityToleranceRotation);
00245 
00246     ros::Rate r(cycleFrequencyInHz);
00247 
00248     debugPath = globalNode.advertise <nav_msgs::Path> ("debugRollingWindow", 1);
00249 
00250     while (ros::ok()) {
00251         ros::spinOnce();
00252         controlLoop();
00253         r.sleep();
00254     }
00255 
00256     delete controller;
00257 
00258     return 0;
00259 }
